message: Let's start with a simple offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects our positions in the game.
I think we can do better than that, Alice. Let's start with a more equitable split.

Let's be fair, Alice. We both have a chance to make an offer. Why don't we split it evenly this time and see how it goes?
